title: La Vege
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Chinese, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. 樂蔬, at 大学路199号, is a noodle restaurant located on the 3rd floor of a building in the vicinity of several universities. Sells mostly vegan meals except a couple of beef selections. You select your choice of veggies and noodles and the staff will prepare it with vegan broth. Fruit juice bar with in season fruits. Little English spoken. Accepts Alipay.
